ProjectTitle: Dental Tissue Regeneration via Bioengineerd Immune Modulatory Scaffolds (DREIMS)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/04/2024
Data: please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and/or share those? 
Documentation: will you use additional documentation or metadata, eg protocols, SOPs, gitlab for code, metadata that you collect with nano-CT scans? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: note that a data usage license is only relevant for open data, if you share closed data with externals you will need a data transfer agreement.
